name: Alien War (MrLevRocks)
description:
ΛLIEN WAR is a top-down perspective space shoot-em-up game inspired by the likes of Namco's 1979 game "Galaxian" and (especially) Taito's 1978 game "Space Invaders". 

Fight through endless rounds of alien ships and protect Earth from the invading menace. Breach their defense systems and shoot down their ships one-by-one.

Features: 

  • Endless rounds - endless fun!
  • Save your high score!
  • An extra live every 10000 points!

Controls:
Arrow keys - left and right movement, up and down selection.
Space bar - Shooting
Enter key - Start game and confirm high score.

Special thanks go out to:
A.NB for minor coding assistance.
Taber McFarlin/Taber IV of Stevens Game Development Club for his Space Invaders for GMS2 tutorial.
omniconrex for the GM:S Scheduler Fix library.
